projects.name: Movie Catalog Application
projects.desc: A movie cataloging application that makes use of a feature-vector system to recommend movies based on user favourites.
projects.skills: React, Spring Boot, Bash, Java, JavaScript, PostgreSQL

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.desc: A portfolio showcasing who I am, what my skills are and how I apply them.
projects.skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, Git, Netlify CLI

projects.name: Car Model Finder
projects.desc: A car model finder that makes use of an LRU cache programmed in Python with a hashmap and a doubly-linked list to immediately retrieve function calls to search car models provided the car year and car make from CSV files.
projects.skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, Flask, jQuery AJAX, Git

projects.name: Computer Vision Coin Processor
projects.desc: A coin processing tool that makes use of computer vision to immediately determine coin denominations, provided a configuration image that maps different coins to different values. This coin processing tool yields accurate readings 86.67% of the time, where 13 out of 15 coin test images pass.

projects.name: Chemical Equilibrium Simulator
projects.desc: A web application designed to simulate chemical equilibrium between reactants and products based on changing factors such as temperature, pressure and volume.
